entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 34. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. Wind chill minus 41 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
